When performing "Team > Apply Patch..." on a resource in a custom filesystem, I get a NullPointerException.

The reason behind this problem can be found in org.eclipse.compare.internal.patch.InputPatchPage#adjustToCurrentTarget():718, where the location of the patch target is retrieved. For resources that do not reside on the local filesystem, the methods IResource#getLocation() and IResource#getRawLocation() return null (IResource#getLocationURI() should be used instead). The NPE that occurs at this point is catched and silently ignored.
The NPE I get is generated in the org.eclipse.compare.internal.patch.InputPatchPage#isPatchFile(Reader) predicate (the BufferedReader constructor), because it does not take into account the possibility that the given reader might be null.
